charges.charge_description: 21:841(a)(1) POSSESSION WITH INTENT TO DISTRIBUTE CRACK(1)

charges.charge_disposition: Impr of 9 months as to count 1, and 60 months as to count 2 to be served consecutively for a total of 69 months. SRT of 3 years as to count 1, and 5 years as to count 2, to be served concurrently with each other. SMA of $200. Forfeiture entered as agreed.
